title: LF High Gold-Mid Plat Top Laner for Competitive Team
body:
Kingdom Industry is recruiting for a new top laner to finish off our roster to compete in tournaments and flex. We have a flexible schedule but are planning to hold practices on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday afternoons/nights going by EST.

We are looking for proficiency on Camille, Gnar, and Ornn.
Shen, GP, Sion, and Kled experience is highly valued but not necessary
We are looking for someone consistent, controlled, exceptional at teamfighting, basic self lane allocation knowledge, and skill at managing side waves mid and late game.
Punctuality is mandatory, if you do not think you can regularly come on time, we are probably not the team for you.
If you are interested in trying out, my contact information can be found below:
IGN: Dotrix
Discord: Dotrix#1973

We Look forward to getting some games in, see you on the rift!
